name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II with 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery + Tripod + Kit

reviews.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II with 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery + Tripod + Kit
reviews.reviewText: I upgraded from a Canon Powershot to the EOS T5. I love it! The camera is easy to use and the same type of functions as the Powershot. Takes crisp photos and the zoom is awesome! The movies are great quality too. And the camera with lens is even lighter than my old camera. I'm glad I chose this camera.
reviews.title: Love the T5!

reviews.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II with 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery + Tripod + Kit
reviews.reviewText: Did you know you can take 1080 video with this sweet camera? It is one of the best available. I bought this for my son who is a Theatre Major in College and this is what he requested. Great Camera!
reviews.title: This is more than just a camera!

reviews.name: Canon EOS Rebel T5 Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II with 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card + Case + Flash + Battery + Tripod + Kit
reviews.reviewText: This is a great deal for someone just starting to take pics
reviews.title: Great buy
